parameters.name: ConfigValue
parameters.description:
The log retention period that is allowed by the SQL Explorer feature on the instance. Valid values:

*   30: 30 days
*   180: 180 days
*   365: one year
*   1095: three years
*   1825: five years

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The resource group ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstanceAttribute operation to obtain the resource group ID.
